name: Total Battle
description: Vanquish hordes of monsters, plan your attacks on other players in the world full of magic, clan wars and political tricks. Unite the whole kingdom under one banner in the Total battle â€“ free-to-play online strategy game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended) Processor: Core 2 Duo / Athlon X2 / 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 / ATI Radeon HD4650 / NVidia Geforce 430 (512MB) DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
